attributes.review:
Somebody once told me
The world is gonna roll me
I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed
She was looking kind of dumb
With her finger and her thumb
In the shape of an "L" on her forehead
Well, the years start coming
And they don't stop coming
Fed to the rules and I hit the ground running
Didn't make sense not to live for fun
Your brain gets smart, but your head gets dumb
So much to do, so much to see
So what's wrong with taking the back streets?
You'll never know if you don't go
You'll never shine if you don't glow
Hey now, you're an all star
Get your game on, go play
Hey now, you're a rock star

And all that glitters is gold
Only shooting stars break the mold
It's a cool place and they say it gets colder
You're bundled up now, wait 'til you get older
But the meteor men beg to differ
Judging by the hole in the satellite picture
The ice we skate is getting pretty thin
The water's getting warm so you might as well swim

That's the way I like it and I never get bored

And we could all use a little change
Well, the years start coming
And they don't stop coming

attributes.review: ✨In order to support our amAzing president and show my support for America I decided to download this app. 🇱🇷🇱🇷 ❤️✨Only for it to take HOURS to download. 😡 I mean I cant say I was surprised since the prEsident is slower than the app. 🙈But Once it FINALLY downloaded 🙄 it asked for me to make an account with ALL my information. Which of course I filled out because anythjng for daddy tRump. ☺️Upon closer inspection of the app I read the user agreement and it said they could STEAL AND SELL MY INFORMATION!!! 💢💢💢 THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS!!!  I didn’t think anything of it at the time UNTIL I STARTED GETTING RANDOM PHONE CALLS AND MESSAGES. 😡 The messages told me that trump is built like an obese Cheeto. SO RUDE but I cAN’t deny tHe facts 😔🤪😔... I tracked down the person who sent me this and I found it was BARRON TRUMP‼️WHY IS HIS EX- WIFE USING OUR INFORMATION⁉️AND WHY DOES HE HAVE ACCESS⁉️ANYWAys, my credit card info was being used to buy tRump 2020 merch (which I own ENOUGH of). I DECIDED TO DELETE THE APP BUT GOT A DEATH THREat❗️ I WAS WORRIED FOR MY LIFE AND GETTING NIGHTMARES OF TrUmp coming to my house at night and ⚰️ ❌me AND FEEDING ME HIS TOE FUNGUS 🤢🤮🤕 I THOUGHT ENOUGH WAS ENOUGH 🙅‍♀️AND DELETED THE APP... The next day the CIA SHOWED UP ON MY DOOR AND THREATENED ME. ❌❌❌The only way I was able to survive was to join them. I currently have access to TOP SECRET information ❗️❗️❗️❗️❗️ BUT THEY ARE WATCHING AND MONITORING EVERYTHING I DO AND SAY SO I CANT SAY MUCH BUT WHAT I CAN SAY IS.... ✨trump is throwing a party 💕🧚✨and with YOUR HELP we can make it his funeral 🧚🙈✨⚰️💅😘 p.s all trump supporters are being BRAINWASHED with the Trump 2020 merch... it gives off a scent that only affects the people with low IQ and the scent causes them to WORSHIP TRUMP and be IGNORANT🤭🤫😮😡😡 ✨❗️
